td.content: s:pt presents with mild heavy menstural bleeding, mild persistent fatigue, Blood. she has history of mild bleeding between periods. she is a 55 year old white f grocer. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 5 years in her past she smokes one pack/day of cigarettes o:Height 150 cm, Weight 43.4 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC.

td.content: s:female grocer aged 55 ys complains of recurrent mild persistent fatigue over the past month. The patient reports mild heavy menstural bleeding, mild bleeding between periods. o:Height 151 cm, Weight 45.3 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC.
